verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> also came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, you dwell<WH3427> in the midst<WH8432> of a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>, which have eyes<WH5869> to see<WH7200>, and see<WH7200> not<WH241>; they have ears to hear<WH8085>, and hear<WH8085> not<WH4805>: for they are a rebellious house<WH1004>.

Therefore<WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, prepare<WH6213> your stuff<WH3627> for removing<WH1473>, and remove<WH1540> by day<WH3119> in their sight<WH5869>; and you shall remove<WH1540> from your place<WH4725> to another<WH312> place<WH4725> in their sight<WH5869>: it may be they will consider<WH7200>, though they be a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>.

Then shall you bring forth<WH3318> your stuff<WH3627> by day<WH3119> in their sight<WH5869>, as stuff<WH3627> for removing<WH1473>: and you shall go forth<WH3318> at evening<WH6153> in their sight<WH5869>, as they that go forth<WH4161> into captivity<WH1473>.
Dig<WH2864> through the wall<WH7023> in their sight<WH5869>, and carry out thereby<WH3318>.

In their sight<WH5869> shall you bear<WH5375> it upon your shoulders<WH3802>, and carry it forth<WH3318> in the twilight<WH5939>: you shall cover<WH3680> your face<WH6440>, that you see<WH7200> not the ground<WH776>: for I have set<WH5414> you for a sign<WH4159> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.

And I did<WH6213> so as I was commanded<WH6680>: I brought forth<WH3318> my stuff<WH3627> by day<WH3119>, as stuff<WH3627> for captivity<WH1473>, and in the even<WH6153> I dug<WH2864> through the wall<WH7023> with my hand<WH3027>; I brought it forth<WH3318> in the twilight<WH5939>, and I bore<WH5375> it upon my shoulder<WH3802> in their sight<WH5869>.
And in the morning<WH1242> came the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> unto me<WH559>, saying,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, has not the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, the rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>, said<WH559> unto you<WH6213>, What do you?

Say<WH559> you unto them<WH559>, Thus says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; This burden<WH4853> concerns the prince<WH5387> in Jerusalem<WH3389>, and all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> that are among them<WH8432>.
Say<WH559>, I am your sign<WH4159>: like as I have done<WH6213>, so shall it be done<WH6213> unto them<WH1473>: they shall remove and go<WH3212> into captivity<WH7628>.

And the prince<WH5387> that is among<WH8432> them shall bear<WH5375> upon his shoulder<WH3802> in the twilight<WH5939>, and shall go forth<WH3318>: they shall dig<WH2864> through the wall<WH7023> to carry out<WH3318> thereby<WH3680>: he shall cover his face<WH6440>, that<WH3282> he see<WH7200> not the ground<WH776> with his eyes<WH5869>.

My net<WH7568> also will I spread<WH6566> upon him<WH8610>, and he shall be taken in my snare<WH4686>: and I will bring<WH935> him to Babylon<WH894> to the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans<WH3778>; yet shall he not see<WH7200> it<WH4191>, though he shall die there.
And I will scatter<WH2219> toward every wind<WH7307> all that are about<WH5439> him to help<WH5828> him<WH102>, and all his bands; and I will draw out<WH7324> the sword<WH2719> after them<WH310>.
And they shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068>, when I shall scatter<WH6327> them among the nations<WH1471>, and disperse<WH2219> them in the countries<WH776>.

But I will leave<WH3498> a few<WH4557> men<WH582> of them from the sword<WH2719>, from the famine<WH7458>, and from the pestilence<WH1698>; that they may declare<WH5608> all their abominations<WH8441> among the heathen<WH1471> where they come<WH935>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068>.
Moreover the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came to me<WH559>, saying,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, eat<WH398> your bread<WH3899> with quaking<WH7494>, and drink<WH8354> your water<WH4325> with trembling<WH7269> and with carefulness<WH1674>;

And say<WH559> unto the people<WH5971> of the land<WH127>, Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, and of the land<WH776> of Israel<WH3478>; They shall eat<WH398> their bread<WH3899> with carefulness<WH1674>, and drink<WH8354> their water<WH4325> with astonishment<WH8078>, that her land<WH776> may be desolate<WH3456> from all that is in it<WH4393>, because of the violence<WH2555> of all them that live in it<WH3427>.
And the cities<WH5892> that are inhabited<WH3427> shall be laid waste<WH2717>, and the land<WH776> shall be desolate<WH8077>; and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068>.
And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, what is that proverb<WH4912> that you have in the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, The days<WH3117> are prolonged<WH748>, and every vision<WH2377> fails<WH6>?

Tell<WH559> them therefore<WH559>, Thus says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; I will make this proverb<WH4912> to cease<WH7673>, and they shall no more use it as a proverb<WH4911> in Israel<WH3478>; but say<WH1696> unto them<WH3117>, The days are at hand<WH7126>, and the effect<WH1697> of every vision<WH2377>.
For there shall be no more any vain<WH7723> vision<WH2377> nor flattering<WH2509> divination<WH4738> inside<WH8432> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.

For I am the Lord<WH3068>: I will speak<WH1696>, and the word<WH1697> that I shall speak<WH1696> shall come to pass<WH6213>; it shall be no more prolonged<WH4900>: for in your days<WH3117>, O rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>, will I say<WH1696> the word<WH1697>, and will perform<WH6213> it<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>.
Again the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came to me<WH559>, saying,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, behold<WH1004>, they of the house of Israel<WH3478> say<WH559>, The vision<WH2377> that he sees<WH2372> is for many<WH7227> days<WH3117> to come<WH5012>, and he prophesies of the times<WH6256> that are far off<WH7350>.

Therefore say<WH559> unto them<WH559>, Thus says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; There shall none of my words<WH1697> be prolonged<WH4900> any more<WH1697>, but the word which I have spoken<WH1696> shall be done<WH6213>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>.
